keyword: how many calories in 1 hershey kiss
title: How Many Calories in 1 Hershey's Kiss?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in 1 Hershey's Kiss, including carbs, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per piece.
h1: How Many Calories in 1 Hershey's Kiss?
assumptions: Standard milk chocolate Hershey's Kiss, approximately 5 g each, no fillings or variations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, and manufacturer batch. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Hershey's Kiss contains about 22 calories and 2.6 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Hershey's Kiss?
faqs.a: Approximately 22 calories per milk chocolate Kiss.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Hershey's Kiss?
faqs.a: About 2.6 g of carbs, mostly sugars, per piece.

faqs.q: Does a Hershey's Kiss have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 0.3 g protein and 1.3 g fat (0.8 g saturated) per Kiss.

faqs.q: How does Hershey's Kiss nutrition compare to other chocolates?
faqs.a: Similar to small chocolates; higher sugar than dark varieties.
Yes, only about 3 mg sodium per Kiss.
